title: Quantum Weyl algebras
abstract: For any Hecke symmetry $R$ there is a natural quantization $A_n(R)$ of the Weyl algebra $A_n$. The aim of this paper is to study some general ring-theoretic aspects of $A_n(R)$ and its relations to formal deformations of $A_n$. We also obtain further information on those quantizations obtained from some well-known Hecke symmetries.
